title: Galaxy Z Flip 4 battery certification all but confirms a fairly big upgrade
content:
It seems the Galaxy Z Flip 4 will be shipping with a bigger battery, and a new leak all but confirms it’s going to be a bigger upgrade than some earlier leaks suggested.

more…

The post Galaxy Z Flip 4 battery certification all but confirms a fairly big upgrade appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Galaxy Z Flip 4 is looking like an exciting release from Samsung, and it seems the battery will be better with a pretty huge boost.
